txt.en: You have just 'equipped' an item to an outfit.  You will not receive any stat benefit by equipping this item to your outfit.  To receive the stat bonuses of this item you must equip it in your main inventory.  Equipping an item to an outfit records the appearance of the item, but leaves the item in your inventory.  You can delete, bank, or sell the item and the appearance will remain in your outfit until the appearance is removed from your outfit.  Thats right, you don't need to keep the item to keep its appearance.  To unequip this item from your outfit, simply drag the item from your outfit to the landscape.

You have just 'equipped' an item to an outfit. You will not receive any stat benefit by equipping this item to your outfit. To receive the stat bonuses of this item you must equip it in your main inventory. Equipping an item to an outfit records the appearance of the item, but leaves the item in your inventory. You can delete, bank, or sell the item and the appearance will remain in your outfit until the appearance is removed from your outfit. That's right, you don't need to keep the item to keep its appearance. To unequip this item from your outfit, simply drag the item from your outfit to the landscape.
